verbs.description: as [ARG1: netflix] [V: surges] original content is the new black but licensed shows still take the crown a times analysis shows that original content accounts for a greater percentage of new releases on the streaming platform as licensed titles from other studios are on the wane amazoncom goldman sachs martin scorsese alfonso cuarón netflix
